settings module¶

class settings.Settings¶

Bases: object

Class that handles settings

get_mode()¶

Returns set game mode.

get_number()¶

Returns number of players.

set_mode(mode)¶

Sets game mode. :param bool mode: True if enabled powerups, False otherwise

set_number(number)¶

Sets number of players. :param int number: number of players
